SEARCH
Package gw.api.system

Class PLConfigParameters

java.lang.Object
gw.api.system.PLConfigParameters
public class PLConfigParameters extends Object
Used to fetch the values of configuration parameters defined in config.xml

The list of parameters here is the list of all legal configuration parameters.

      The percentage of the heap to allocate to the global cache.*

    • GlobalCacheSizeMegabytes

      public static final IntegerParameterKey GlobalCacheSizeMegabytes
      The amount of space to allocate to the global cache. If this value is specified, it will take precedence over GlobalCacheSizePercent. *

    • GlobalCacheStaleTimeMinutes

      public static final IntegerParameterKey GlobalCacheStaleTimeMinutes
      Time (in minutes) since last write before cached items are considered stale and eligible for reaping. *

    • GlobalCacheReapingTimeMinutes

      public static final IntegerParameterKey GlobalCacheReapingTimeMinutes
      Time (in minutes) since last use before cached items are considered eligible for reaping. This can be thought of as the period during which an entity is most likely to be re-used. *

    • GlobalCacheActiveTimeMinutes

      public static final IntegerParameterKey GlobalCacheActiveTimeMinutes
      Time period (in minutes) when cached items are considered "active", i.e. the cache should give higher priority to preserve these items. This can be thought of as the period when items are being heavily used, e.g. how long a user stays on a page. It should be less than the reaping time. *

    • GlobalCacheStatsWindowMinutes

      public static final IntegerParameterKey GlobalCacheStatsWindowMinutes
      This parameter denotes a period of time (in minutes) and is used for two purposes: 1) how long to preserve the reason why an item was evicted, after the event occurred. When a cache miss occurs, the reason is looked up and reported in the CacheInfo page. 2) The period for which to display statistics on the chart on the CacheInfo page.

    • GlobalCacheStatsRetentionPeriodDays

      public static final IntegerParameterKey GlobalCacheStatsRetentionPeriodDays
      This parameter denotes the period of time (in days), in addition to today, for how long statistics are preserved for historical comparison.

    • GlobalCacheDetailedStats

      public static final BooleanParameterKey GlobalCacheDetailedStats
      This parameter determines whether or not detailed statistics should be collected. If "true", the reason for eviction is recorded and correlated with later misses. This data is preserved only for the duration of the statistics window (defined by GlobalCacheStatsWindowMinutes). This parameter does not affect the collection of basic statistics such as hit and miss ratio.

    • ActivityPatternCacheMaxDuration

      public static final IntegerParameterKey ActivityPatternCacheMaxDuration
      Upper bound on how long caches of activity pattern entities are allowed to exist without refresh, measured in seconds *

    • RoleNameCacheStaleTimeMinutes

      Time (in minutes) since last bean change to Roles to consider the RoleNameCache stale and rebuild it

    • UseDeprecatedExchangeRates

      public static final BooleanParameterKey UseDeprecatedExchangeRates
      Determines whether to use old-style admin exchange rates in InsuranceSuite applications.

      In ClaimCenter, when set to true, exchange rates are stored in the legacy ExchangeRate admin table, potentially being reused by multiple claims and transaction objects. When set to false, each new usage retains its own copy in an ExchangeRateInUse entity object. This ensures that any usages within a claim are part of that claim's graph, allowing for safe archiving without affecting other claims.

      Once the application is deployed, if this setting is initially set to true, it can be changed to false, but it cannot be changed back to true after being set to false.

      SINGLE = Single currency mode. MULTIPLE = Always in multiple currency mode. *

    • AddressExtraFieldClusteringDatabaseUpdateRetryTimeout

      public static final IntegerParameterKey AddressExtraFieldClusteringDatabaseUpdateRetryTimeout
      Argument (in ms) used to calculate the timeout per retry for each cluster node to perform synchronized Address Extra Field config update operations. On each retry, each cluster node will wait AddressExtraFieldClusteringDatabaseUpdateRetryTimeout ms longer than on the last retry, up to a maximum wait of AddressExtraFieldClusteringDatabaseUpdateSleepTimeCeiling ms per retry.

    • ConfigVerificationEnabled

      public static final BooleanParameterKey ConfigVerificationEnabled
      If clustering is enabled, whether to check this server's configuration against the other servers in the cluster. If false (not recommended), any difference in configuration is considered to be COMPATIBLE and a rolling upgrade is triggered at server startup. Thus, a full upgrade is not possible when this parameter is false. Furthermore, the behavior is undefined if this parameter is false and there are datamodel changes.

      NOTE: The semantics of this parameter have changed in Ferrite. Please review the documentation for details.

    • PrintMaxNestedListViewSize

      public static final IntegerParameterKey PrintMaxNestedListViewSize
      When printing a list nested inside a detail view, the list will be truncated to this size. Nested lists cause the PDF generator to consume a lot of memory so this parameter is used to prevent long nested lists from causing memory problems *

    • PersonalDataDestructionEnabled

      public static final BooleanParameterKey PersonalDataDestructionEnabled
      Enable or disable destruction of personal data.

    • ContactDestructionRequestAgeForPurgingResults

      public static final IntegerParameterKey ContactDestructionRequestAgeForPurgingResults
      Minimum number of days that must pass after ContactPurgeRequest has been purged when the request is eligible for purging.

    • ArchiveEnabled

      public static final BooleanParameterKey ArchiveEnabled
      Whether or not the archive feature is enabled in the system.

    • ProfilerDataPurgeDaysOld

      public static final IntegerParameterKey ProfilerDataPurgeDaysOld
      The number of days to keep profiler data before they can be deleted *

    • WorkflowPurgeDaysOld

      public static final IntegerParameterKey WorkflowPurgeDaysOld
      The number of days to keep workflow information before they can be deleted *

    • WorkflowLogPurgeDaysOld

      public static final IntegerParameterKey WorkflowLogPurgeDaysOld
      The number of days to keep workflow logs before they can be deleted *

    • WorkflowLogPurgeRowLimit

      public static final IntegerParameterKey WorkflowLogPurgeRowLimit
      The number of rows to purge in one delete transaction *

    • WorkflowLogDebug

      public static final BooleanParameterKey WorkflowLogDebug
      Whether debugging messages should be turned on for workflow logging *

    • BatchProcessHistoryPurgeDaysOld

      public static final IntegerParameterKey BatchProcessHistoryPurgeDaysOld
      The number of days to keep batch process history before they can be deleted*

    • BatchProcessPopulateSearchColumnsParallelDML

      public static final BooleanParameterKey BatchProcessPopulateSearchColumnsParallelDML
      Setting to enable or disable parallelism (oracle only) in the populate search columns batch process *

    • InstrumentedWorkerInfoPurgeDaysOld

      public static final IntegerParameterKey InstrumentedWorkerInfoPurgeDaysOld
      The number of days to keep instrumentation information for a distributed worker instance before they can be deleted*

    • ClusterMemberPurgeDaysOld

      public static final IntegerParameterKey ClusterMemberPurgeDaysOld
      The number of days to keep cluster members records before they can be deleted

    • ClusterClockChangeDelaySeconds

      public static final IntegerParameterKey ClusterClockChangeDelaySeconds
      Non-production only: time to delay before changing clock in a cluster

    • TransactionIdPurgeDaysOld

      public static final IntegerParameterKey TransactionIdPurgeDaysOld
      The number of days to keep external transaction ids records before they may be deleted *

    • LockPrimaryEntityDuringMessageHandling

      public static final BooleanParameterKey LockPrimaryEntityDuringMessageHandling
      Issue pl-9001 dealt with a performance penalty for locking during message send processing. This lock also occurs when the message is acted upon in the UI or in a message reply plugin.. Normally this should not be an issue and the locking of primary entity first prevents deadlocks. However, some sites consider this not worth the penalty and have agree to insure that deadlocks don't occur (i.e., by either not locking message, or locking all message on the primary object before locking the primary object). If the message has no primary entity then this has no effect.

    • LockDuringDistributedMessageRequestHandling

      @Deprecated public static final BooleanParameterKey LockDuringDistributedMessageRequestHandling
      Deprecated.
      Not implemented, due to performance concerns.

    • UseOracleHintsOnMessageQueries

      public static final BooleanParameterKey UseOracleHintsOnMessageQueries
      Issue PL-28921 was attempting to optimize oracle for message queries. But with a full time DBA there maybe other means of accomplishing this

    • PostgresqlEfssRandomPageCost

      public static final IntegerParameterKey PostgresqlEfssRandomPageCost
      Can be used to raise random_page_cost to encourage fast sequential scan on Bulk WorkQueue Inserts.

      WARNING: Potential performance impact. You must get approval from Guidewire Cloud Operations before setting this.

    • BulkInsertSelectCardinalityEstimatorHint

      public static final ListParameterKey BulkInsertSelectCardinalityEstimatorHint
      Issue ISPL-2753 - Comma-separated list of tables to force PRE2014 cardinality estimator hint in BulkInsertSelectPreparedStatementHandler.

    • StrictDataTypes

      public static final BooleanParameterKey StrictDataTypes
      True if data types should validate in "strict" mode. Differences between "strict" and "legacy" mode:
      • Decimal values are not automatically rounded to the required scale. Callers are responsible for rounding as necessary.
      • FieldValidator-based data type values must conform to the required format, at the persistence layer. In "legacy" mode, non-conforming values could be set at the persistence layer, bypassing checks that only exist in the UI.
      • Numeric range restrictions are enforced at the persistence layer. In "legacy" mode, non-conforming values could be set at the persistence layer, bypassing checks that only exist in the UI.

    • CurrentEncryptionPlugin

      public static final StringParameterKey CurrentEncryptionPlugin
      The name of the current encryption plugin. Typically, at most one encryption plugin will ever be configured, but in case the encryption algorithm needs to change, then a new plugin will need to be configured for the new algorithm. The previous encryption plugin should remain, however, in order to handle upgrade.

    • PluginStartupTimeout

      public static final IntegerParameterKey PluginStartupTimeout
      OSGi plugins startup timeout (in seconds). PluginConfig component waits if necessary for at most this time for all required OSGi plugins to start. PluginConfig component reports an error for each OSGi plugin that does not start after this timeout expired.

    • DefaultXmlExportIEncryptionId

      public static final StringParameterKey DefaultXmlExportIEncryptionId
      The name of the default xml encryption implementation.

      The default value is null, no encryption by default.

    • WebservicesConfigParamAvailableServices

      public static final StringParameterKey WebservicesConfigParamAvailableServices
      This is where to obtain the available web services. It will look first class path (classLoader resource), in module (TypeSystem resource), and finally in config (ConfigAccess). If not specified then all gosu classes annotated with @WsiWebService are available.

    • WebservicesConfigParamHideServiceListPage

      public static final BooleanParameterKey WebservicesConfigParamHideServiceListPage
      Whether to hide the list of services. This will override the value in the web.xml. This will default to true.

    • WebservicesConfigParamHideDetails

      public static final BooleanParameterKey WebservicesConfigParamHideDetails
      Whether to hide the details of a service. This will override the value in the web.xml. This will default to true.

    • EnableVerbosePingServlet

      public static final BooleanParameterKey EnableVerbosePingServlet
      Whether to display verbose ping information.

    • EnableInfoServlet

      public static final BooleanParameterKey EnableInfoServlet
      Whether to display version information about the current application.

    • KnownLinksWithIssues

      public static final ListParameterKey KnownLinksWithIssues
      This is list of links with known issues, they are formatted as ":" *

    • KnownUnreachableTables

      public static final ListParameterKey KnownUnreachableTables
      This is list of known unreachable tables, they are formatted as "" *

    • IdentifyQueryBuilderViaComments

      public static final BooleanParameterKey IdentifyQueryBuilderViaComments
      SQL Server ONLY: Whether to include additional information in a comment to identify the execution context of a query IdentifyQueryBuilderViaComments: when set to its default value of "true" will report on all SQL code generated by query builder layer. IdentifyORMLayerViaComments: has a default value of "false", so it need to be enabled first by setting its value to "true" and then it will report on ORM layer activity at the bundle level and below.

    • IdentifyORMLayerViaComments

      public static final BooleanParameterKey IdentifyORMLayerViaComments

    • PDFMergeHandlerLicenseKey

      public static final StringParameterKey PDFMergeHandlerLicenseKey
      The site license for the default pdf merging product. Cannot be overridden for an individual server or role.

    • ReCallDocumentContentSourceAfterRollback

      public static final BooleanParameterKey ReCallDocumentContentSourceAfterRollback
      This flag indicates that if a Document has been rolledback, that on commit both the isDocument and addDocument should be called again *

    • MaxAllowedDate

      public static final DateParameterKey MaxAllowedDate
      Demarcation for business days *

    • MinAllowedDate

      public static final DateParameterKey MinAllowedDate
      Demarcation for business days *

    • FreeTextSearchEnabled

      public static final BooleanParameterKey FreeTextSearchEnabled
      The default state of Solr Search support is enabled. Setting this parameter to false will disable all Solr related processing within the application, thus disabling any external search and indexing features.

    • ConsistencyCheckerThreads

      public static final IntegerParameterKey ConsistencyCheckerThreads
      The number of threads to use when running the consistency checker

    • SearchLanguageOverride

      public static final StringParameterKey SearchLanguageOverride
      Default collation language for the application as a whole (Unsupported)

    • FinalDocumentsNotEditable

      public static final BooleanParameterKey FinalDocumentsNotEditable
      Whether the final document status requires a permission handler or is dealt with in the validation logic.

    • WebUIAJAXTimeout

      public static final IntegerParameterKey WebUIAJAXTimeout
      Default timeout in seconds for Web UI AJAX requests

    • SerializationWhitelistEnabled

      @Deprecated public static final BooleanParameterKey SerializationWhitelistEnabled
      Deprecated.
      Deprecated: Use SerializationAllowListEnabled

    • SerializationAllowListEnabled

      public static final BooleanParameterKey SerializationAllowListEnabled
      Whether a class name must be listed in the serialization allow list to allow deserialization of its respective instances.

    • DisableSequenceUtil

      public static final BooleanParameterKey DisableSequenceUtil
      Whether the SequenceUtil.next(long, java.lang.String) method is disabled. If true, the SequenceUtil.next(long, java.lang.String) method will throw an exception when called. The purpose of this parameter is to assist customers wishing to replace Guidewire's sequence implementation with their own implementation. This parameter forces the Guidewire implementation to "fail fast," so that developers can find places they need to patch.

      You must consult with Guidewire Support before implementing your own sequence generation.

    • ExternalUserAccess

      public static final EnumParameterKey<ExternalUserAccessMode> ExternalUserAccess
      ExternalUserAccess defines how the system is going to limit, if at all, how users, groups and producer codes can be affiliated with each other.

      Fully Restrictive - Users can only be affiliated with a group or producer code from their own organization Protected Internal- External users can be affiliated with a group or producer code in an external organization. Internal users are unrestricted Allow Internal - All users can be affiliated with any group or producer code

    • ArchiveReferenceTrackingEnabled

      @Deprecated public static final BooleanParameterKey ArchiveReferenceTrackingEnabled
      Deprecated.
      Obsolete - archive reference tracking is now always enabled.

    • ScopedVariableSupportedForAllCapturedRequests

      public static final BooleanParameterKey ScopedVariableSupportedForAllCapturedRequests
      Whether the ScopedVar.isRequestAvailable() method also accepts webservices and Gosu servlets as valid sources for variables.

    • ConfigurationServiceEnabled

      public static final BooleanParameterKey ConfigurationServiceEnabled
      Whether the application will use an external Configuration Service as a source for some of its configuration. If enabled the application will load and manage configuration through a Configuration Service. When disabled existing local configuration is used.

    • ImportUserDataEnabled

      public static final BooleanParameterKey ImportUserDataEnabled
      Whether the application will import user data.

    • ExportUserDataEnabled

      public static final BooleanParameterKey ExportUserDataEnabled
      Whether the application will export user data.

    • MaximumXmlExportSize

      public static final IntegerParameterKey MaximumXmlExportSize
      The maximum allowable XML export size (in megabytes) which may be loaded into memory. Any attempt to export via admin API larger amount of data than this will fail. This parameter protects the server from possible memory consumption problems.

    • WorkflowProvidedStepLocalizationLocales

      public static final StringParameterKey WorkflowProvidedStepLocalizationLocales
      Workflow steps will be delivered with a set of provided StepLocalizations. Locales used in these StepLocalizations are not required to be present in customer's Language typeKeys, as it is required for any StepLocalization. These locales are set by this property and by default it is not present in config.xml so system always uses the given default list. Specify another list in config.xml if you want workflow to skip verification of the particular locales.

    • FrozenSetsEnabled

      public static final BooleanParameterKey FrozenSetsEnabled
      Indicates whether beans can be put in a FrozenSet for inter-cluster transfer.

    • OverrideRESTSchemaWarnings

      public static final EnumParameterKey<WarningMode> OverrideRESTSchemaWarnings
      Forces warnings of all categories to be enabled (WarningMode.ON), disabled (WarningMode.OFF), or defer to the "x-gw-suppress-warnings" properties of the individual REST Swagger schemas (WarningMode.DEFAULT).
      See Also:
      • OverrideJSONSchemaWarnings
      • OverrideJSONMappingWarnings

    • OverrideJSONSchemaWarnings

      public static final EnumParameterKey<WarningMode> OverrideJSONSchemaWarnings
      Forces warnings of all categories to be enabled (WarningMode.ON), disabled (WarningMode.OFF), or defer to the "x-gw-suppress-warnings" properties of the individual JSON schemas (WarningMode.DEFAULT).
      See Also:
      • OverrideRESTSchemaWarnings
      • OverrideJSONMappingWarnings

    • OverrideJSONMappingWarnings

      public static final EnumParameterKey<WarningMode> OverrideJSONMappingWarnings
      Forces warnings of all categories to be enabled (WarningMode.ON), disabled (WarningMode.OFF), or defer to the "suppress-warnings" properties of the individual JSON mappings (WarningMode.DEFAULT).
      See Also:
      • OverrideRESTSchemaWarnings
      • OverrideJSONMappingWarnings

    • TrackBundleWritesForPerf

      public static final BooleanParameterKey TrackBundleWritesForPerf
      Enables detection of writes in bundle for performance reporting.

      Only to be used temporarily, when requested by Guidewire Support.

    • ShowAllSqlValuesInLogs

      public static final BooleanParameterKey ShowAllSqlValuesInLogs
      Enables inclusion of all values in SQL statements in logs.

      WARNING: This will expose Personally Identifiable Information. Only to be used temporarily, when requested by Guidewire Support.

      public static final BooleanParameterKey ShowAllSqlValuesInProfiler
      Enables inclusion of all values in SQL statements in the SQL Profiler.

      WARNING: This will expose Personally Identifiable Information. Only to be used temporarily, when requested by Guidewire Support.

      public static final BooleanParameterKey ShowAllSqlSelectValuesInProfiler
      Enables inclusion of all values in SQL SELECT statements in the SQL Profiler.

      WARNING: This will expose Personally Identifiable Information. Only to be used temporarily, when requested by Guidewire Support.

    • AdditionalSqlValueDataTypesToAlwaysShow

      public static final SetParameterKey AdditionalSqlValueDataTypesToAlwaysShow
      Set of names of additional data types whose values must always be shown in SQL statements.

      WARNING: This may expose Personally Identifiable Information. You must get approval from Guidewire Support before setting this.

    • WhiteListDocumentUploadMimeTypes

      @Deprecated(forRemoval=true) public static final BooleanParameterKey WhiteListDocumentUploadMimeTypes
      Deprecated, for removal: This API element is subject to removal in a future version.
      Obsolete - does nothing. This configuration parameter is scheduled for removal in a future release.

    • PreloadRestServletConfig

      public static final BooleanParameterKey PreloadRestServletConfig
      If set to true, this config parameter will cause the REST servlet to preload its configuration when the servlet is initialized. Otherwise, the REST configuration will be lazily loaded on the first request to the servlet.

    • PhoneNumberStrictValidation

      public static final BooleanParameterKey PhoneNumberStrictValidation
      If set to false, this config parameter will cause PhoneValidator to interpret phone numbers quite leniently. If true, the libphonenumber validator will be used to perform a more stringent validation.

    • EnableAbsoluteMaxSessionLength

      public static final BooleanParameterKey EnableAbsoluteMaxSessionLength
      Whether the application should enforce an absolute maximum session length. If an active, authenticated session passes the AbsoluteMaxSessionLength number of minutes, the session will be invalidated immediately, and all in-progress work will be lost.

    • MaxNumberOfArchivedEntitiesToRestore

      public static final IntegerParameterKey MaxNumberOfArchivedEntitiesToRestore
      The maximum number of archived entities to be allowed in bulk restore. Note that this property limits the number of input archived entities, but the actual restored depends on the number of valid archived entities.

    • AbsoluteMaxSessionLength

      public static final IntegerParameterKey AbsoluteMaxSessionLength
      The amount of time, in minutes, an active session can be maintained. A request with a session that was created more than AbsoluteMaxSessionLength's number of minutes ago will be immediately invalidated, and all in-progress work will be lost.

    • EnableEventsOnImportOfFile

      public static final SetParameterKey EnableEventsOnImportOfFile
      This will enable events when importing the specified filename. This is on import step of upgrade. This is very customer specific, for example loading typecodes in PC which cause an event to be generated to duplicate the typecode in BC. Or loading of contact info causing messages to ContactManager.

      You must consult Guidewire Support before setting this.

    • MaximumAllowedNumberOfBatchSubRequests

      public static final IntegerParameterKey MaximumAllowedNumberOfBatchSubRequests
      The maximum number of sub-requests allowed in a batch api request.

    • MaximumAllowedNumberOfCompositeSubRequests

      public static final IntegerParameterKey MaximumAllowedNumberOfCompositeSubRequests
      The maximum number of sub-requests allowed in a composite api request.

    • AllowedCompositeRequestTags

      public static final ListParameterKey AllowedCompositeRequestTags
      A comma-separated list of tags that will be allowed as the requestTag value of a Composite API request. Values not present in this list will be ignored and will not be sent as metric tags. Tag names must start with a letter, consist of alphanumeric characters or underscores, and are limited to at most 150 characters. The list of allowed tags is limited to 100 unique values.

    • StructuredLoggerLightLoggingEnabled

      public static final BooleanParameterKey StructuredLoggerLightLoggingEnabled
      This parameter determines whether light-logging or standard logging is enabled for the Structured Logger By default, standard logging is enabled Light logging reduces the number of parameters set in the LogData object for output to JSON

    • StructuredLoggerRemoveCRLFEnabled

      public static final BooleanParameterKey StructuredLoggerRemoveCRLFEnabled
      This parameter determines whether carriage return characters should be removed from the log message By default, this is disabled This is useful to be enabled for local development environments and generally should remain disabled for GWCP-deployed environments

    • UserLoggingOverrides

      public static final ListParameterKey UserLoggingOverrides
      For security reason the logging of user has been reduced to publicId, the format is location:LogWhat, the possible see UserLogWhat for possible values. If there is no location then it sets the default. Some example configurations are: Legacy (before security fix) "Assignment:dbId,SessionInfo:username,RestDispatch:username,MDC_user:dbId,MDC_userId:username,MDC_userName:display,WebLogin_user:username,WebLogin_userId:dbId,GosuServlet:username,InternalUser:username,OracleStats:display,DataConflictException:username" always username except for duplicates "username,MDC_userId:none,MDC_userName:none,WebLogin_userId:none"

    • AsyncApiRequestPurgeDaysOld

      public static final IntegerParameterKey AsyncApiRequestPurgeDaysOld
      The number of days to keep async API request rows before they get removed. Note that this time is calculated from the time the request was accepted for processing, not the time that the request completed.

    • AsyncApiRequestThreadPoolSize

      public static final IntegerParameterKey AsyncApiRequestThreadPoolSize
      The number of threads in the server's async API request thread pool. You must get approval from Guidewire Cloud Operations before setting this.

    • AsyncApiRequestQueueSize

      public static final IntegerParameterKey AsyncApiRequestQueueSize
      The maximum size of the queue of async API requests that have been accepted but which have not yet started processing. You must get approval from Guidewire Cloud Operations before setting this.

    • AsyncApiRequestThreadIdleTime

      public static final IntegerParameterKey AsyncApiRequestThreadIdleTime
      The time, in seconds, that a thread in the async API request thread pool can be idle before it's shut down. You must get approval from Guidewire Cloud Operations before setting this.

    • EnablePreLoader

      public static final BooleanParameterKey EnablePreLoader
      Whether the application should enable preloading classes/types/etc. found in the contents of PLConfigResourceKeys.PRELOAD_TXT files across modules. By default this is true, meaning that preload will execute. Set to false to disable preloading. Extensive preload.txt files can significantly increase startup time, so it can be useful to disable this functionality for some servers such as when running tests.

    • AllowRestAuthViaSession

      public static final BooleanParameterKey AllowRestAuthViaSession
      Whether or not to allow session-based authentication for REST API calls. This should only be enabled if the appserver has been configured such that the session cookie will be marked as SameSite=lax or strict. You must get approval from Guidewire Cloud Operations before setting this.

    • RequireTypeSystemLockForPreLoad

      public static final BooleanParameterKey RequireTypeSystemLockForPreLoad
      Whether to get and hold the type system lock during preloading.

      You must consult Guidewire Support before setting this.

    • ApiExtensionBundlesDesignModeEnabled

      public static final BooleanParameterKey ApiExtensionBundlesDesignModeEnabled
      Whether design mode is enabled for API extension bundles. This feature is not yet supported for customer use and is disabled by default.

    • ExtensionPackagesDesignModeEnabled

      @Deprecated public static final BooleanParameterKey ExtensionPackagesDesignModeEnabled
      Deprecated.
      Use ApiExtensionBundleDesignModeEnabled instead Whether design mode is enabled for extension packages. This feature is not yet supported for customer use and is disabled by default.

    • DeclaredPrivacyMaskCharacters

      public static final ListParameterKey DeclaredPrivacyMaskCharacters
      A comma-separated list of mask characters that will generate a screen-reader legible label for privacy widgets in read-only mode if it follows the format of masked characters followed by non-masked characters.
